Description:
Quality Investment Or Lifestyle Opportunity
If you are after the ideal investment currently receiving $295 per week, or lifestyle without the hefty price tag this neat 5 year old residence should be on your hit list!
Featuring a well appointed kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space complimented by quality stainless steel appliances.
Comprising 3 sizeable bedrooms with robes and an immaculate two way bathroom off the master with separate shower and bath. But it is the generous living and dining space that separates this from the rest, and perfect for all occasions low maintenance yard.
Off street parking will be made easy with a single car garage while heating and cooling is taken care of with ducted heating and split system A/C.
With Corio Shopping Centre and the Ring Road both only moments away, the convenience of this home to live in or rent out couldn't be any more obvious. With schools, parkland and public transport only a short stroll away, the absolute value on offer here is not to be missed.
Insights: 147B Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat 3 bedroom brick veneer home.
This charming brick veneer 3 bedroom home situated on a secure 534m2 allotment offers a wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or neat investment that boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway & major amenities close by. Capitalise on this lovely tidy home with a versatile floorplan comprising of 3 generous bedrooms (2 with BIR's), large living area with gas heating adjacent the practical kitchen with ample bench space & gas cooking, central bathroom & separate laundry. Outside lies a single garage with additional room at the back for a work area, undercover alfresco area, garden shed & plenty of rear yard still left over. Immaculately presented & cared for, this property is a neat and tidy investment for all. Brilliantly located in close proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre, numerous schools for all ages, easily accessible public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD. Property with potential like this won't last long, you better be quick!

Description:
Charming family home on a 613m2 allotment.
Presenting a fantastic opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value this neat 3 bedroom home on a 613m2 allotment could be exactly what you've been waiting for. Providing an excellent opportunity for those wanting to enter the market or investors looking for a tidy property to rent out straight away. The property features three bedrooms all serviced by an updated bathroom and a generous living area with gas heater. The modest kitchen and dining overlook the extended laundry at the rear of the home that provides access to the large backyard where you will find a tandem double lock up garage/workshop, additional shed, covered alfresco dining and beautiful in ground pool. It is the perfect backdrop to create endless fun for the whole family with birthdays, BBQs and entertaining. There is scope to add your own touch and make this into your own piece of paradise. Location is ideal, just a short commute to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!

Description:
Family Home + Self-Contained Unit
Spacious family home offering versatility in accommodating the extended family including teenagers, parents or grandparents. The main residence offers 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, formal lounge dining room plus open plan kitchen /dining in addition to a fully self-contained 1 bedroom unit with separate entrance presenting the new owners with many options including the advantage of working from home without disturbing the rest of the family, there is also the opportunity to lease out the self-contained unit creating passive income. With easy access to Geelong Ring Road, the property offers great value for money in a quiet, family friendly location. The property sits on a large block of 590.90m2 meticulously maintained by the current owners. A paved covered outdoor entertaining area is accessed through sliding glass doors just off the family dining room. Other features include Gas heating and 2 split system air conditioners. Neat and well presented, this residence is bound to impress.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A comfortable and convenient lifestyle.
Offering a prime position in the Cloverdale Estate lies this neat brick veneer home on a 554m2 allotment providing a comfortable and convenient lifestyle for its new owners. Perfectly suited for an array of purchasers, if your searching for a first home to add your own style, families looking for a generous rear yard or investors wanting a set and forget property with potential for future growth. Comprising of a comfortable lounge upon entrance which opens onto the meals area and practical kitchen complete with built in pantry and gas cooking. Centrally located you'll find the laundry with external access, bathroom with separate shower and bath both within easy reach to the 3 generous bedrooms which all contain BIR's. With an oversized driveway off street parking is available in the double carport which can also be transformed into an undercover alfresco area if you prefer. The rear yard itself offers an abundance of space still for pets or children to enjoy. Public transport is available right out front of the home, with close proximity to multiple reserves, Corio shopping centre and Geelong's Ring Road location is ideal. Don't delay, inspections are a must for this immaculate home.

Description:
A Little Earner!
This charming single-storey family home boasts great appeal! With original features retained throughout, this 3 bedroom property offers you the potential to enjoy a passive income of $260.00 per week while currently tenanted for 6 months. A functional kitchen provides upright gas stove, oven and breakfast bar, while the carpeted lounge room ensures comfort with ceiling fan and heater. Ample parking is provided with a double lock-up garage and carport, while the gated backyard leads to an undercover verandah at the rear of the property. Located within proximity of the Ring Road and close to schools, shops, public transport, this residence has ideal investment or development potential (STCA).

Description:
Nothing to do but move in and enjoy!
This lovely 3 bedroom home has all you will need and more. Sitting on 572m2 it provides a very attractive package. Comprising a recently renovated home with updated kitchen and bathroom. New double blinds throughout and slate through the kitchen and dining areas and split system for heating and cooling. Outside features 2 undercover entertaining areas as well as a SLUG with powered workshop space. The home is finished off with a neat lawn and low maintenance garden both front and back.
This home will appeal to those who want to move in straight away with nothing to do. Equally, it will impress first home buyers as there is nothing to spend on the home. For the investor this is ideal as it will be an attractive rental package with estimated rental return of $300.00/week. And for the downsizer this neat home will appeal also.
Around the corner from Village Shopping Centre and with easy access to the ring road and Melbourne this is a must see property.

Description:
Step Right In!
Set on a generous 639 sqm allotment, this single-owner family home features 4 bedrooms with built-in-robes and two temperature-controlled living zones. The kitchen provides breakfast bar, dishwasher and upright gas stove and oven. With maximum space for maximum comfort, the bespoke features of this home include a huge, fully enclosed entertainment area with pot belly stove, downlights, aluminium windows, canvas awning blinds on front and rear windows and a 3.2 kw solar system affixed to the tiled roof. In addition, the large landscaped backyard offers side access for a boat, caravan or trailer. With Ring Road access, this residence is close to all amenities including schools, shops and public transport.

Description:
Excellent Family Home Opportunity
Located only minutes from public transport, the Corio Village Shopping Centre & with fast & easy access to Melbourne this solid brick home offers everything a family needs in a sought after pocket with huge solar panel rebates in place until 2025! Offering an open plan kitchen, meals & dining area with glass sliding doors granting access to the outdoor entertaining area, as well as a large light filled living area with split system A/C & stunning high cathedral ceilings. The kitchen offers stainless steel appliances including gas (5) burner cook top & electric oven, a spacious walk in pantry, insinkerator, water purifier plus an abundance of bench & cupboard space. 3 good sized bedrooms are offered throughout the home, all of them featuring large built in sliding robes, the main bedroom also offering a split system A/C & ceiling fan. The central bathroom is conveniently located between the bedrooms & offers a shower, bath, vanity & separate toilet. The front of the house also offers an additional study area & sun room. Outside offers a fantastic enclosed & undercover entertaining area, perfect for all year round entertaining, as well as a private yard, garden shed, single carport & double garage with an additional storage room. Extras throughout the home include gas central heating, secure alarm system, external shutters & a powerful solar panel system offering a 66c rebate locked in until 2025 which accounts for the majority of the bills! For those looking for an investment opportunity the approximate potential rental return is $300-$310 per week.
Insights: 9 Cardross Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Great first home or start to a portfolio
Positioned on 590sqm, this solid brick home is neat as a pin and features 2 bedrooms with BIR; master with ceiling fan. 2 carpeted living zones comprise formal dining room adjacent to formal lounge with gas heater, air conditioner and ceiling fan. An updated galley kitchen provides upright gas stove and ample cupboard space, while the original bathroom offers separate shower and bath. Additional benefits include concealed hardwood floors, window awnings and undercover patio at rear. A manicured backyard and driveway access to a detached single-car garage with remote controlled door ensures plenty of storage options for cars, boats and trailers. Within walking distance of Corio Village Shopping Centre, schools and public transport, this location is hard to beat!
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 24 Kalver Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect 604m2, 3 bedroom home.
Well located in the heart of Corio lies this neat 3 bedroom home on an approx. 604m2 allotment providing an excellent opportunity for those looking to get a foothold in the property market or secure themselves their first family home. The home comprises of a spacious carpeted lounge upon entry with split system air-conditioning & heating & a neat, open-plan kitchen with plenty of storage. The central hallway flows through to the three generous bedrooms which surround the very clean, well-maintained bathroom. Through the laundry you can make your way to the extensive rear yard with a beautiful undercover area and plenty of space for the kids or a man's best friend. With all major amenities within easy reach such as the Corio Shopping Centre, Medical facilities, schools for all ages and public transport, positioning could not be better!
Photo ID Required
Insights: 10 Kiewa Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Versatile family living.
This extremely neat and well maintained home sits on a lavish and secure 780m2 approx. allotment offering ample room for the whole family to enjoy, nestled away in a quiet court location with close proximity to all major amenities. This exceptional property reflects the care and attention by the current owners and provides a large lounge boasting polished floorboards and gas heating with access to the practical kitchen adjacent the laundry. Three comfortable sized bedrooms in total (2 with BIR's) are located nearby the central bathroom while outside a convenient workshop space provides an additional W/C perfect for an added rumpus room or storage if needed. Secure parking is ensured in the large garaging to the side of the property which has had a portion of the space converted into an enclosed studio or potential 4th bedroom. Ample space still remains in the large driveway for storing boats, caravans or trailers if required. This incredible brick veneer home offers so much versatility for investors and owner occupiers alike. Location is ideal just a short drive to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages & sporting facilities nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway this home really does have it all!
Insights: 4 Clive Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
